item.title: 11 killed in Australian shooting targeting Jewish community, premier says
item.description: The prime minister described the mass shooting as "act of evil antisemitism."

item.title: Person of interest in custody after fatal Brown University shooting, official says
item.description: Brown University lifted its lockdown early on Sunday morning.

item.title: WATCH: The sweet story behind a senior couple's pool wedding
item.description: Danny New explains how splashing around in the water sparked true love for one couple in Illinois, and how it led to them tying the knot in the most u...

item.title: WATCH: At 100, war veteran still volunteers to tell history
item.description: Danny New speaks to Arthur Grabiner, a WW II veteran who continues to educate people about his experience during the war in the Pacific.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
